Enetcloud Fully Managed VPS | Free Domain , Free Migration starting $25/Mo



Hello,

We are pleased to announce our new Fully Managed VPS Servers with a FREE DOMAIN. This is a promotion with only limited VPS slots available including a FREE DOMAIN account of worth $12. As you may or may not know uptime is one of our core focuses and as you can see we practice what we preach, You can start with starter VPS and seamlessly upgrade to a larger VPS with no downtime as needed or
just add resources on fly. We hope to see you join the growing Enetcloud Hosting family!

We start with custom high end Quad-core Xeon VPS nodes packed with excessive RAM. Our combination of high quality raid editions drives, high-end RAID-10 arrays, and custom tweaking yield superior performance. Last but not least we load your VPS with powerful vps management software from a world leader in virtualization software.
